item.description:
Philip Antoniades, MySQL Senior System Engineer, will speak on "What's new in MySQL 5.0". There is an event (WWE wrestling) at 7:45 pm on the 12th, so parking may be an issue. Arrive early, and take public transit!

(We are working to get a space that's more car-friendly for Jan and beyond).

Optaros has offered space at their office at:

60 Canal St, map at
http://tinyurl.com/8t...
Very close to North Station -- Orangle and Green Lines, and Commuter Rail.

Please feel free to post on the message board if you want to meet for food beforehand. Pizza and soda will be served, so please RSVP accurately.
item.name: The Boston MySQL December Meetup
